abstract.p: The Transform Classify Lightside component allows users to apply a machine-learned text classifier to a column of their data. For example if the input has a column "post" that contains student postings in a MOOC chat, select "Post" as the column to classify, enter "transactivity" as a name for a new column, and upload a lightside .XML model file that detects transactivity in English text. The component will add a new column "transactivity" with 1 or 0 values in it marking which postings exhibit this property. All the other columns will remain the same.
